tasks.label: Meson Cleanup and Setup/Install
tasks.command: if [ -d "_build" ]; then ninja -C _build uninstall && rm -rf _build target; fi && meson setup _build --prefix="$(pwd)/target" && meson install -C _build

tasks.label: Meson Cleanup and Setup/Install (Windows - PowerShell)
args: if (Test-Path "_build") { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force "_build" } ; if (Test-Path "target") { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force "target" } ; meson setup _build --prefix="$(pwd)\target" ; meson install -C _build
tasks.detail: Pre-launch task for cleaning and setting up the build environment using PowerShell.
